content.en: Efficiency of FDTD: Researchers are exploring ways to improve the computation efficiency of the finite-difference time-domain (FDTD) method, with algorithms being attributed as the key to this improvement. They are also investigating the extension of the alternating direction implicit finite-difference time-domain (ADI-FDTD) method to a full three-dimensional wave, again relying on algorithms for this extension. Additionally, algorithms are being used to develop various methods, such as the unconditionally stable finite-difference time-domain (US-FDTD) method, the hybrid implicit-explicit finite-difference time-domain (HIE-FDTD) algorithm, and the Laguerre-based finite-difference time-domain (FDTD) method, to address different challenges in electromagnetic simulation.
content.da: Effektivitet af FDTD: Forskere undersøger måder at forbedre beregningseffektiviteten af ​​finite-difference time-domain (FDTD) metoden, hvor algoritmer tilskrives som nøglen til denne forbedring. De undersøger også udvidelsen af ​​den alternative retnings implicitte finite-difference time-domain (ADI-FDTD) metode til en fuld tredimensional bølge, igen ved hjælp af algoritmer til denne udvidelse. Derudover anvendes algoritmer til at udvikle forskellige metoder, såsom den ubetinget stabile finite-difference time-domain (US-FDTD) metode, den hybride implicitte-eksplicitte finite-difference time-domain (HIE-FDTD) algoritme, og den Laguerre-baserede finite-difference time-domain (FDTD) metode, for at tackle forskellige udfordringer i elektromagnetisk simulation.
